summary: Federal agencies must evaluate the historic significance of their properties and consider historic preservation when maintaining their properties. We reviewed DOD’s practices on its military installations. At most of the installations we visited, we found that: In cases where homes had been transferred to private developers, developers said they did not try to identify historic significance People working in preservation said they believed maintenance personnel...
title: Defense Infrastructure: Additional Actions Could Enhance DOD's Efforts to Identify, Evaluate, and Preserve Historic Properties
